awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A young caterpillar yearns to fly like the butterflies and birds, but cannot launch himself high enough to do so - until a couple start playing badminton nearby.
plot: A young caterpillar yearns to fly like the butterflies and birds, but cannot launch himself high enough to do so - until a couple start playing badminton nearby.
title: Gagarin
